description: Detects Chafer activity attributed to OilRig as reported in Nyotron report in March 2018
name: Chafer Activity
query: ((process.command_line:*\\Service.exe* AND process.command_line:(*i OR *u)) OR (process.command_line:*\\microsoft\\Taskbar\\autoit3.exe OR process.command_line:C\:\\wsc.exe*) OR (process.executable:*\\Windows\\Temp\\DB\\* AND process.executable:*.exe) OR (process.command_line:*\\nslookup.exe* AND process.command_line:*\-q\=TXT* AND process.parent.executable:*\\Autoit*))
author: Florian Roth
Markus Neis
Jonhnathan Ribeiro
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
oscd.community
